newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's Autlan announces stock-split offer.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's Autlan announces stock-split offer.

text.p: Mexican mining firm Compania Minera Autlan SA de CV said on Thursday it planned to offer shareholders a stock split during a September 10 meeting.
Autlan said in a statement through the Mexican Stock Exchange that it would offer two B shares for each A or B share in circulation. B shares are ordinary shares with voting rights, the company said.
It offered no other details on the proposal.
